Module BayesianClassifier

Package fileIO

Package related to reading the train and test files.
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ReadFile
    Performs a standardized way to get data from a file ReadFile interface provides a way to read a file which guarantees matching with all code structure already developed
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Dataset
    The class is used to save information and all instances of the input file
    InputParams
    This Class makes the input parameters parsing and saves the arguments as attributes
    Instance
    Class represents an instance/row from a data set.
    ReadCSV
    ReadCSV class reads an CSV file and save it to a Dataset .
